main event: Two teenagers observed an unidentified flying object in the sky over San Marcos, Texas, on August 8, 1954, at approximately 8:45 P.M.
interesting points: The object was first sighted near the horizon and appeared to be moving slowly across the sky.,The object was reported to be disk-shaped and emitting a bright reddish-orange glow.,As the object approached, it increased in speed and brightness.,The object took a very sharp 90-degree turn at one point.,The object crossed over the witnesses and disappeared.
sighted object: a disk-shaped object emitting a reddish-orange glow
